title: Barachi (monster)
data:
{{version031}}
''This page is about the barachi [[monster]]. For the player race, see [[Barachi]]. For a list of all amphibians, see [[list of reptiles and amphibians]].''
{{monster info|barachi}}

==Useful Info==
A '''barachi''' (plural '''barachim''') is an amphibious, frog-like humanoid. They move slowly, but can swim.

If you don't see one in a player-themed [[vault]], it's a [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifter]].

==Tips & Tricks==
* None needed. Their slow speed makes them even less threatening then most species-based monsters.

==History==
*Barachim were added along with the player race in [[0.20]].
